alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 11:48PM AKST until December 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Light freezing rain expected this afternoon and evening. Plan on slippery road conditions. In addition, areas of poor visibility are expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 inches are expected. Ice accumulations of a light glaze are expected. * WHERE...Southeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...6 PM today to 6 PM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
